MSPmentor says Eric Schmidt 's Google has gained "more channel partner momentum with managed services providers. Indeed, 29 of the world's top 100 MSPs now promote Google Apps to their end-customers." The article asks, Will that trend continue when the CEO crown soon shifts from Eric Schmidt to Google co-founder Larry Page? Spin off? While there's no reason to think Google would kill off Google Apps, there are scenarios that could trouble enterprise customers, Gartner analysts say. Jay Gruden hasn't received any overriding direction from Marvin Lewis on how to run the offense. "He's the head coach, so whatever vision he has is my vision," Jay Gruden said. If he has a vision of running the ball 30 times, then that's going to be the vision. We'll do the best we can to appease him. But there's been no vision that's been told to me right now. It's just come on in here, install your offense and let's make a change.-- Joe Kay Eagles promote two defensive coaches PHILADELPHIA( AP)- The Philadelphia Eagles have promoted Mike Munchak Caldwell to linebackers coach and Michael Vick Zordich to secondary/safeties coach.
